Blog.post: work as bin finished totally it was wank and i advise everyone not to get a job cos there shite.south africa won the tri nations, you know i wer right alt time and they deserved it.schalk burger is a legend and the kiwi's suck balls.just wait till england play boks.fuckin hell they will get pissed on.just waitin fot weekend fot tick over and then training starts.its results day on thursday n im fair nervous cos it felt weird doingt exams.oh well. x

today is me last day at this bag a shite workplace.hahaha.i hope no-one from work actually visits this place otherwise il be in some shit.hahaha.no more pointless photocopying or "documentation"as that prick ian would say.its been a reet crack wi ash, terry, malc, gemma, pete and fitters but part from that bollocks really.money for nothing though which has bin fair shit hot.hahaha.i do wish that people would txt me and mail me more while i was at work cos it brightened up me day but anyway, iv finished now so who gives a shit.kirkham on monday, i know i go on about it but its gonna be so shit hot, you dont even know.training everyday and school abit and posh, dirty girls(sorry but it had to be said).you should know by now that me history of girls has bin reet shit, i dont know if theres something wrong wi me or if its the girls i like. i liike girly girls , proper girls not them chaps with the wrong reproductive organs that most are today.pink and fluffy and chocolate and nice voices and nice hair and all the right aspects of girlyness. they are girls aren't they? they should be girly, the exact opposite of me. there not naughty minded and dont enjoy getting muddy and dont laugh when they get a crack in the face and glow up when their happy, ones where you can smell the girlyness and the "aura" of femininity surrounds them.ones who have soft skin and love cuddling and are girls!sorry to go on but i feel so much about this and it hurts most of the time to know that im missing out on them, they're a dying breed and iv got to celebrate them. x

just counting down't days iv got left fot work here.just two remain or one if you dont count today. recently iv bin concentrating on wearing different styled clothes to me usual and not doin me hair like one a them common tarts you see alt time now.i know girls like them man tart kinda blokes but i aint goint change for someone else.that could be todays "thought fort day" just like mr dean did at high school.you'll know if you went to standish, you red jumpered monsters.i wonder how mr dean is, what a physics teacher. il see you lot in abit, kiss me bottom. x

just a shout at to me ghetto chums from standish who are back off holiday, you know who you are. and a special bunny kiss to the specialist one, you should know who you are hopefully. work is pap, training is ace, springboks are ace, workpants are ace too. kirkham next week...you know motherfuckers.x

iv not bin updating this very much but thats cos nofin is apenin.apart from me needing some food right now im not feelin too much.i start kirkham next week, thats it.see you in abit x. south africa beat the kiwi bastards, go on lads.told you zip you big lesbian.x
i just fannied bout wi that html shite n managed fot add some links. tres cool .check em out, beever eat my arsehole. x

i am so tired.theres nowt fo me fot do at work now,iv done evryfin i can n now so its a reet bag a shite.al just sit ere at someone elses desk n pretend to do some work,but really il write me new blog.its reet top notch this blog.if any one feels like it start a blog today urlLink www.blogspot.com its fookin brill.n if you fink your the only whos stuck in a reet shite job n you ate it go on urlLink www.lowmorale.co.uk it makes you feel soooo good.id add these links to't side at page but i dont know how.if any of you lot can help me wi this html balls it wud be reet bo. urlLink www.lazylaces.com and urlLink www.zfilter.com are good uns to.i went on about training last nite but its true bout it bein shit hot.play rugby its good.im currently explorin't web n watchin some prick talk balls in the office.its just like youd expect.desperate to make a difference doin a worthless job to buy shit they dont need.just like in fight club.its all true.the all singing all dancing crap of the world.wey hey!bit of depressing shite the'er.but its alright cos most of us can av a orgasm. x

oooooo!me new blog,shud be well fun.started this at work today so i am well happy cos i did this instead of work.went to manchester to pick up an engineer and wer gobsmacked by the different kinds a people in there.it wer well gud.the girls wer amazin,imagine all the bottoms.i wana work there instead a heywood,but i gota go to college first,wey hey!sorry to anyone reading this but this is what me lifes composed of at moment cos im sixteen.you shud undertand though you wer all sixteen once.just bin finkin bout existance n all that shite.its mad as toast.i wer lookin at the thunder clouds last night, ther shit hot.you shud look at em next time bolts of lightenin are charging up inside em.cnt wait to train tonight and volley some skulls.rugby is ace, its the best fing iv got so far you should all try a game.none of that jonny wilkinson is the best and england can only win with im just any rugby. iv startd believin in south africa cos at the moment they look fuckin brill.x
